localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Get inspired and discover how companies are implementing the OpenAI GPT-3 API to power new use cases. The GPT-3 name and logo are the property of OpenAI
nodes.title: GPT-3 Demo - A showcase of 60+ GPT-3 resources, examples, and use cases
nodes.author: GJ

nodes.excerpt: Rows combines the power of a spreadsheet with built-in integrations with your business apps. No scripts. No plugins. Automate workflows, analyze data, share dashboards, and build forms and tools that make work simpler. Then, share them as beautiful web apps!
nodes.title: Rows beta - The spreadsheet where teams work faster
nodes.author: Christian Reber

nodes.excerpt: FlutterFlow is an online no-code platform that empowers people to build native mobile apps visually, enabling quick iteration. Unlike other no-code tools, FlutterFlow makes it easy to view and export clean Flutter code that can be customized.
nodes.title: FlutterFlow - Build cross-platform Flutter mobile apps visually.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: â€” select services you depend on â€” check their status in your menu bar â€” get notified when they change their status
nodes.title: Instatus Out - Monitor services in your menu bar
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Customers are demanding control over their personal data. Give it to them with ease. âœ” Onboard your app or website in minutes âœ” Securely send data with easy to use APIs and SDKs âœ” Give your end-users complete control with the plug-n-play Personal Data Center.
nodes.title: Rownd Data Privacy Platform - Give your users control over their personal data
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See whoâ€™s watching and engaging with your content

nodes.excerpt: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
nodes.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XMLâ€¦)
nodes.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.
nodes.author: Michael ğŸ˜ Galpert

nodes.excerpt: Qubely is a full-fledged Gutenberg block toolkit with plenty of custom blocks, predefined sections and starter packs to create beautiful web pages. It minimizes the limitations of the Gutenberg editor and opens unlimited possibilities.
nodes.title: Qubely - WordPress Gutenberg blocks and page builder
nodes.author: Kevin David

nodes.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
nodes.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
nodes.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today
nodes.author: Marta

nodes.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
nodes.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices
nodes.author: MING

nodes.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. â€œthis will increase your bill by 25% next monthâ€.
nodes.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: - FIFO queue to automate Github CI/CD workflows - 3 mins quick setup - Avoid conflicts and keep builds green - Keep Pull Requests up to date with the base branches - Automatically dequeue failed builds
nodes.title: MergeQueue - Automate Githubâ€™s CI/CD in under 3 mins
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: The biggest update yet, Diagrams 2.0 Macaw, brings full optimization for macOS Big Sur and the new M1 Macs, along with many new features like palette presets, customizable palettes, and new styling options.
nodes.title: Diagrams 2.0 - A major update to your diagramming experience on Mac
nodes.author: Lukas Kubanek

nodes.excerpt: TextBuddy is a Mac app for manipulating text. A Swiss Army knife for plain text that is there when you need it and hidden when you donâ€™t. Faster than your IDE. Easier than the command line. Transform and extract text from images and audio, too.
nodes.title: TextBuddy for macOS - A Swiss Army knife for plain text.
nodes.author: Tyler Hall

nodes.excerpt: Reshift is a developer-first security tool that helps developers find and fix vulnerabilities in their custom JavaScript code.
nodes.title: Reshift Security - Find Vulnerabilities in Your JavaScript Code for Free!
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: 1. Save your team's repeated questions from Slack/Teams and provide access to everyone on the team. 2. Create a Subject Matter Experts Directory so that team members know whom to ask about what. 3. Let folks ask the external community of experts when needed.
nodes.title: Standuply Q&A - Internal Q&A platform for Slack or MS Teams
nodes.author: Alex Kistenev

nodes.excerpt: SVGX is a FREE offline desktop SVG icon/asset manager and browser for Mac and Windows. Use it to quickly locate the perfect icon for your design, copy and edit the SVG code, generate repeating background CSS, and more.
nodes.title: SVGX - Desktop SVG asset manager for designers and developers
nodes.author: Constantin

nodes.excerpt: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
nodes.title: Ray.so by Raycast - Create beautiful images of your code
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
nodes.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
nodes.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration
nodes.author: Florian Albrecht
